name: skaflo
description: Clean folder structures. Zero boilerplate. Create organized project directories without any files - perfect for developers who want structure without assumptions.

scripts.build: node scripts/message.js build-start && tsc && node scripts/message.js build-success
scripts.build:clean: node scripts/message.js build-clean-start && rimraf dist && tsc && node scripts/message.js build-success
scripts.test: node scripts/message.js test-start && jest --passWithNoTests && node scripts/message.js test-success
scripts.test:coverage: node scripts/message.js test-coverage-start && jest --coverage --passWithNoTests && node scripts/message.js test-coverage-success
scripts.lint: node scripts/message.js lint-start && eslint && node scripts/message.js lint-success
scripts.lint:fix: node scripts/message.js lint-fix-start && eslint --fix && node scripts/message.js lint-fix-success
scripts.typecheck: node scripts/message.js typecheck-start && tsc --noEmit && node scripts/message.js typecheck-success
scripts.format: node scripts/message.js format-start && prettier --write src/**/*.ts && node scripts/message.js format-success
scripts.format:check: node scripts/message.js format-check-start && prettier --check src/**/*.ts && node scripts/message.js format-check-success
scripts.quality: node scripts/message.js quality-start && eslint && tsc --noEmit && jest --passWithNoTests && node scripts/message.js quality-success

author: QuayeDNA <quayedna@example.com>
